text.section: To qualify for a license, an applicant shall be an individual who meets the requirements of this section.

The applicant shall:
Be of good moral character; and
Be at least 18 years old.

The Board shall waive the education requirements under this section if an individual was certified by the National Athletic Trainers' Association Board of Certification, Inc., on or before October 1, 2012, and is currently in good standing.
